alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 2:16AM CST until January 15 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Missouri, southeast Iowa and west central Illinois. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The most hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
